alert.note: Alert for Southern Columbia; Suwannee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 3:26PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Columbia and east central Suwannee Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 325 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Columbia, or 9 miles north of Ichetucknee Spring, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Columbia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
